mapper.select: select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, reg_date, edit_date from faq where faq_id=#{faq_id};
select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from faq where faq_id=#{faq_id};
select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from faq where faq_id = (select faq_id from faq where faq_id > #{faq_id} order by faq_id limit 0,1)
select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from faq where faq_id = (select faq_id from faq where faq_id < #{faq_id} order by faq_id desc limit 0,1)

select faq_id, faq_title, faq_content, reg_date, edit_date from faq
faq_title like concat('%', #{faq_title}, '%')
or faq_content like concat('%', #{faq_content}, '%')
order by faq_id desc
limit #{offset}, #{listCount}
